scripts.start:unix: concurrently "cd backend && ./gradlew bootRun" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:win: concurrently "cd backend && gradlew.bat bootRun" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build:unix: concurrently "cd backend && ./gradlew build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.build:win: concurrently "cd backend && gradlew.bat build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
